UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: A family of brevinin-2 peptides with potent activity against Pseudomonas aeruginosa from the skin of the Hokkaido frog, Rana pirica.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Sonnevend A, Patel M, Al-Dhaheri K, Nielsen PF, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, Iwamuro S, Pál T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM)
